dialogs.text: Hello! How are you? I am your manager. You must be the new employee of Unipar, right? Welcome!
Hello! I am the new employee! I am here to learn about the daily life in the company and what safety protocols I should follow to keep my safety.

Right! You can already know the areas of our factory and their rules. But first, take the PPE's and stay safe! An accident occurred in a factory of one of our competitors here in Cama√ßari and we don't want the same to happen here! Let's go! You have a lot to do!
Ok! I will be very careful!.
